item.title: Progressive Inspirations No. 1 - Overture from Der Freisch端tz
item.description: Overture from Der Freisch端tz Excerpt - 6'10" in recording The first excerpt in this series comes from the “Overture” from Der Freisch端tz. There is no masterful counterpoint and the “progression” itself is really just a long prolongation, but the effect is wonderful. Low Level Overture from Der Freisch端tz Excerpt - Low Level Analysis At first glance it may be hard to see how this is simply a prolongation of the same chord interval of a third.
